participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and optimistic, she loves nature and enjoys her free time outdoors. Ella is passionate about helping others and has a playful side.
participant_1.background: My first purchase was a bike, so I could enjoy the woods on my own terms. I am not able to afford a house because of my financial situation. I like to start my day with a cup of coffee in the woods. I want to be a doctor. I dress in a way that is fun and reflects my personality.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and humorous, he loves telling jokes and expressing himself through art. Jake enjoys relaxing at home and spending quality time with his dog.
participant_2.background: After I quit my job, I returned the 2 monitors to my boss. I'm going to work on a new piece for my portfolio. I'm looking forward to a relaxing weekend at home with my dog, playing games and watching movies. Connor McGregor is my favorite fighter. I love to tell jokes.

content.text: What are you up to this weekend?
I'm going to relax at home with my dog, play some games, and watch some movies.
That sounds fun! I like to do that too. What games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but I'm really into Overwatch right now.
I haven't played that game in a while. It's really fun!
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. I'm really excited for the new season to start.
Me too! I'm hoping to get back into it soon.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I've been playing a lot of Destiny 2 lately.
Oh yeah, I've heard good things about that game.
It's pretty good. It's a lot like Destiny 1, but with some new features.
I might have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
